name: 蘇春𤂌
objective:
先修課程：微積分或負責教授同意。常微分方程式、線性常微分方程式、拉普拉氏轉換、級數及傅立葉級數、線性代數及矩陣、積分定理。
Ordinary differential equations (ODE’s), linear ODE’s, Laplace transform, series and Fourier series, linear algebra and matrix, and integral theorem.
schedule:
week 1: First-Order Differential Equations
week 2: First-Order Differential Equations
week 3: Linear Second-Order Equations
week 4: Linear Second-Order Equations
week 5: The Laplace Transform
week 6: The Laplace Transform, Series Solutions
week 7: Matrices and Linear Systems
week 8: Matrices and Linear Systems
week 9: Midterm Exam
week 10: Determinants
week 11: Eigenvalues, Diagonalization, and Special Matrices
week 12: Eigenvalues, Diagonalization, and Special Matrices
week 13: Systems of Linear Differential Equations
week 14: Systems of Linear Differential Equations
week 15: Fourier Series
week 16: Fourier Series
week 17: The Fourier Integral and Transforms
week 18: Final Exam
scorePolicy:
1. 出席
2. 作業
3. 小考
4. 期中考
5. 期末考
materials: 教科書: Advanced Engineering Mathematics, 7e,  Peter V. O'Neil, Cengage Learning, 2012
